
    class EAS 
    {

        class missionFlow {
            file = "functions\flow";
            class f00 {};
            class f01 {};
        }

        class actions {
            file = "functions\actions";
            class vls {};
        }

        class events {
            file = "functions\events";
            class towerADead {};
            class towerBDead {};
            class powerPlantDead {};
            class copilotDead {};
            class radarSite {};
            class radarSiteDead {};
            class tigrisDead {};
            class tigrisOne {};
            class tigrisTwo {};
            class tigrisTwoDead {};
            class hardDeck {};
            class newHardDeck {};
            class endMission {};
        }

        class cutscenes
        {
            file = "functions\cutscenes";
            class intro {};
            class planeTakeOffTalk {};
        };

    }
